title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for expression of average rate of change

1 point is earned for answer with reason

f(6)−f(a) 6−a =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4172@ when f(a)=f(6). There are two values of a for which this is true.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for expression of average rate of change

1 point is earned for answer with reason

f(6)−f(a) 6−a =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4172@

There are two values of a for which this is true.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for expression of average rate of change

1 point is earned for answer with reason

f(6)−f(a) 6−a =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4172@

There are two values of a for which this is true.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for expression of average rate of change

1 point is earned for answer with reason

f(6)−f(a) 6−a =0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4172@

There are two values of a for which this is true.
